duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess and troubleshoot computer support problems and apply understanding of computer software and hardware products and services to resolve user issues.
Support day to day IT operations and manage the office network.
Research and apply new technologies to the organization in an efficient manner.
Adhere to direction from Senior IT personnel to perform job duties while adhering to the schedule & scope.
Administrate phone system, data network, security system, video surveillance, and access control as instructed by Senior IT personnel.
Maintain user access control, printer issues, connectivity issues, and other day to day user issues.
Participate in IT meetings and update project plans for IT projects.
Deploy desktops, laptops, monitors, phones, and peripherals as instructed by Senior IT personnel.
Troubleshoot and repair malfunctioning IT managed equipment such as desktops, laptops, phones, etc.
Manage documentation for IT department as necessary.

skills.skill: General office equipment and general computer proficiency
Network switches, routers, firewall, and servers
